info.1: The asset issuer requires you to log in to their service using your account.
info.2: An authentication transaction will be signed to prove ownership of that account.
The funds will be credited to your Stellar account when the deposit is credited to the asset issuer.

sidebar.headline: Done
sidebar.info: Your deposit has been accepted and will be processed by the asset issuer when your payment arrives.

info.1: Purchase Stellar lumens (XLM) or deposit assets to fund your account. Send USD from your bank account, ETH from your Ethereum wallet, etc.
info.2: Solar acts as a client to the service offered by the asset issuer only.

info.1: Withdraw assets in your account, like USD to your bank account or ETH to your Ethereum wallet.
info.2: Solar acts as a client to the service offered by the asset issuer only.

info.1: The service will only work if you provide personal information about you.
info.2: This usually happens for legal reasons.

body.no-withdrawable-assets: This account holds no withdrawable assets.

info.1: We offer options to buy lumens that do not involve a Stellar asset issuer.
info.2: Stellar lumens (XLM) are the native tokens on the Stellar network. They are used to pay transaction fees, among other things.

info.1: Make sure that you send the funds to the right destination.
info.2: The asset issuer will credit the tokens once your deposit is credited.

info.1: Check the form and provide an amount to withdraw if necessary.
